hero.title: Your Bowl, Your Way
hero.subtitle: Build the perfect bowl with premium proteins, fresh veggies, and bold flavors. Every ingredient is sourced responsibly. Every bowl is made to order. Fast, healthy eating without compromise.

about.title: Join FreshBowl Rewards

chef.name: Alex Rivera
chef.title: Founder & Chief Culinary Officer
chef.bio: After years as a personal chef to pro athletes, Alex founded FreshBowl to make nutritious, delicious food accessible to everyone. Every recipe is designed with health and flavor in perfect balance.

items.text: Game changer for my busy schedule. I can order ahead on the app and it's ready in 5 minutes. Plus I know exactly what I'm eating - full nutrition info!
items.author: Marcus Thompson

items.text: Love that I can customize everything. As someone with food allergies, it's so easy to build exactly what works for me. And it actually tastes amazing!
items.author: Priya Patel

items.text: The Power Protein bowl is my go-to after the gym. 35g of protein and it keeps me full for hours. Rewards program is great too!
items.author: Jake Morrison

items.text: Fast, fresh, and affordable. I eat here 3-4 times a week and never get bored because there are so many combinations. The falafel is incredible.
items.author: Sofia Rodriguez

steps.title: 2. Pick Your Protein
steps.description: Chicken, steak, tofu, falafel, or double protein

items.question: How does build-your-own work?
items.answer: Start with a base (rice, greens, etc.), choose your protein, add unlimited veggie toppings, and finish with sauce. All for one price!

items.question: Do you have nutritional information?
items.answer: Yes! Full nutrition facts are displayed for all items, including calories, protein, carbs, and allergens. The app shows real-time nutrition as you build.

items.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
items.answer: Absolutely. We have vegan, vegetarian, keto, gluten-free, and dairy-free options. Filter by diet in our app.

items.question: How do I earn rewards?
items.answer: Download our app and create an account. You'll earn 1 point per $1 spent. Redeem points for free bowls, drinks, and upgrades.

items.question: Can I order ahead?
items.answer: Yes! Download the FreshBowl app to order and pay ahead. Your bowl will be ready when you arrive - skip the line!

items.question: Do you deliver?
items.answer: Yes, we deliver through our app, DoorDash, Uber Eats, and Grubhub. Bowls are packaged to stay fresh during delivery.

items.question: Do you cater events?
items.answer: Yes! We offer corporate catering and event catering for groups of 10+. Order online or call 24 hours in advance.

items.question: Are you opening new locations?
items.answer: Yes! Check our website for upcoming locations. Want FreshBowl in your area? Let us know through our app.

settings.productNote: Submit your order and we'll contact you to confirm pickup or delivery details.
